CustomField.description: This field is used to track user ID of the Pardot Connected User ID so that certain validation rules don't fire when Pardot is trying to update SF data (ex. Leads, Campaigns, etc.)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to track user ID of the Pardot Connected User ID so that certain validation rules don't fire when Pardot is trying to update SF data (ex. Leads, Campaigns, etc.)
CustomField.label: Integration Override Validations User ID
